Text: This movie is in Hindi.  TPB doesn't seem to have that option, that's why we see some Hindi movies labelled as English Spoken.
Maybe TPB could update its SQL scripts to allow for Hindi in the selection options?  Or start a separate Hindi section for uploads?
Or at least get the Uploader to TELL THE TRUTH, it is NOT in English. Wasted my Download
@ all above .. u should check on imdb before downloading.. if it's in english or in some other language
